learn.name: Spanish Basics
learn.content: Learn basic Spanish phrases. Start with greetings and common expressions. Practice with simple vocabulary.

quiz.name: Spanish Basics Quiz
questions: How do you say 'hello' in Spanish?
What is the Spanish word for 'book'?
How do you say 'thank you' in Spanish?

learn.name: Spanish Verb Conjugations
learn.content: Learn how to conjugate regular verbs in the present tense. Focus on -ar, -er, and -ir verbs.

quiz.name: Spanish Verb Conjugations Quiz
questions: What is the conjugation of 'hablar' (to speak) for 'yo'?
How do you conjugate 'comer' (to eat) for 'Ã©l'?
What is the 'nosotros' form of 'vivir' (to live)?

learn.name: Spanish Numbers
learn.content: Learn the Spanish numbers from 1 to 100. Practice counting and understanding basic arithmetic.

quiz.name: Spanish Numbers Quiz
questions: What is the Spanish word for 'five'?
How do you say 'twenty' in Spanish?
What is the number '30' in Spanish?

learn.name: Spanish Food Vocabulary
learn.content: Learn names of common Spanish foods and drinks. Understand how to order food in a Spanish-speaking restaurant.

quiz.name: Spanish Food Vocabulary Quiz
questions: What is the Spanish word for 'apple'?
How do you say 'bread' in Spanish?
What is the word for 'water' in Spanish?
